expo.name: Roost
expo.description: Roost - Streamline your real estate transactions with secure document management, client communication, and reward tracking for realtors and clients.

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Roost needs camera access to allow you to take photos of documents for secure upload and verification.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Roost needs photo library access to allow you to select and upload documents from your device.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: Roost needs contacts access to help you invite clients and realtors more easily.
infoPlist.NSUserNotificationsUsageDescription: Roost sends notifications to keep you updated on document status, client interactions, and important transaction milestones.
infoPlist.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: Roost uses Face ID to let you log in quickly and securely without entering your password.

plugins.contactsPermission: Roost needs contacts access to help you invite clients and realtors more easily.

plugins.photosPermission: Roost needs photo library access to allow you to select and upload documents from your device.
plugins.cameraPermission: Roost needs camera access to allow you to take photos of documents for secure upload and verification.
